hero.heading: Hi! I’m Sam
hero.description: I'm a Digital Product Manager who doesn't just deliver software – my passion is to use technology to solve real world problems.

about.title: TALK TO ME ABOUT DIGITAL DONE RIGHT
about.description: I help businesses scope, design and deliver impactful digital products and projects. I manage technology teams and facilitate effective communication that ensures visibility to all stakeholders using Agile and human centred design principles and frameworks. I have the ability to design solutions in ambiguous environments.

details.title: Idea to launch of a new digital product connecting healthcare workers to recruiters.
details.description: I conceptualized and led the launch of a beta digital product for healthcare workers migrating to the US and UK. At a design agency, I headed a UX and Dev team, overseeing market research, requirement gathering, design iterations, development, testing, and final deployment, ensuring comprehensive product delivery.
details.Methods: Concept Testing, Contextual Enquiry, Agile Scrum

details.title: Reducing Enquiry to Client times in Aged Care
details.description: Conducted workshops and research to determine friction points in the Enquiry to Assessement an
details.Methods: contextual enquiry, customer interviews, user journey mapping, system design, delivery

details.title: Designing a new product to support people experiencing family and domestic violence
details.description: Conducted contextual research with case workers, victim survivors, and information seekers, and synthesized the findings. Leveraged these insights in a rapid Google sprint to prototype a solution. Collaborated with the e-commissioner for workshops on technology-facilitated abuse. Secured a $200,000 grant from Vodafone Foundation to develop an MVP.

allService.title: Product Discovery
allService.subTitle: Assess whether your idea is both valuable to the customer and technically viable.

allService.title: Product Design
allService.subTitle: Conduct research and analyze customer feedback to guide product direction.

allService.title: Digital Delivery
allService.subTitle: Develop and launch top-quality tech solutions that benefit both consumers and businesses.

allService.title: Learn and iterate
allService.subTitle: Conduct user research and analysis to understand product interactions and pinpoint improvements.
